content: The full Golden Set of Armor and Gear is located within Chapter 3 - The New West. It is craftable at any Shrine upon finishing the chapter. Simply rest at the next Shrine to unlock it in the crafting menu
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Golden_Set.md', within the main section titled 'Golden Set'.
The content is as follows:
The full Golden Set of Armor and Gear is located within Chapter 3 - The New West. It is craftable at any Shrine upon finishing the chapter. Simply rest at the next Shrine to unlock it in the crafting menu
